Scene:
The Tosa Painter's House
(Tosa no shōgen kankyo / 土佐将監閑居)

Play: The Stuttering Painter (傾城反魂香)

Production: October 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Jūzō IV (鶴澤重造 (四))

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))

Tsuruzawa Katsunosuke (鶴澤勝之輔)
